title: Century City 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Dual Master Suites Apartment
map_address: 10275 Missouri Ave near Century Park W
posting_body: ['Century City 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Dual Master Suites Apartment.', '10275 Missouri Avenue is located on a small cul-de-sac in the heart of Century City, a prominent business community which is comprised of several major industry sectors.', 'It is also home to an array of high-end hotels, shopping centers and towering skyscrapers.', 'Century City is bounded by Westwood on the west; the residential areas of Rancho Park, Beverlywood and Cheviot Hills on the south; and Beverly Hills to the east and north.', 'This spacious and bright dual master suites 2 bedroom apartment features a fireplace, recessed lighting, central air and heat, stainless steel appliances and in-unit washer and dryer.', 'The kitchen is equipped with a breakfast bar, granite countertops, and appliances including a refrigerator, a dishwasher, a microwave, a gas stove and an oven.', 'Silton Century City is a timeless apartment community located in Century City.', 'We offer well-appointed Studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom floor plans designed with your needs in mind.', 'If you want to live near the heart of Century City, you’ll love our location.', 'Shop, dine, and recharge immediately outside your front door at the Westfield Century City Mall.', 'Own the moment and enjoy the outdoors at Century Park or explore the latest exhibit at the Annenberg Space for Photography.', 'Plus, treat yourself to everyday conveniences like Gelson’s, Ralphs, Eataly and the weekly Farmers Market.', 'For appointment or for question, call us today at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Visit our website at: <URL>/', '10275 Missouri Avenue', 'Century City, Los Angeles, CA 90025', 'Property Highlights:', 'Parking (covered & gated)', 'Huge walk-in closet', 'Ceramic tile (Kitchen / Dinning room / Bathroom)', 'Central air conditioning and heat', 'Assigned parking', 'Elevator', 'Gourmet kitchens with granite countertops and breakfast bar', 'Nice Size Patio', 'Controlled access', 'Stackable washer / dryer', 'Decorative columns in living room', 'Open floor plan', 'Stainless steel refrigerator / microwave / dishwasher / stove', 'Controlled access entry', 'Fireplace', 'Recessed lighting', 'Roof terrace', 'BBQ/Grill area', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
